name: tm57
effect: Teaches Charge Beam to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Charge Beam to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
The user attacks with an electric
charge. The user may use any remaining
electricity to raise its Sp. Atk stat.
flavor_text_entries.platinum:
The user attacks with an electric
charge. The user may use any remaining
electricity to raise its Sp. Atk stat.

flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
Numerous coins are hurled at the target to inflict
damage. Money is earned after the battle.
flavor_text_entries.sword-shield:
The user stores power, then attacks. If the user
moves after the target, this attack’s power will
be doubled.
